pkgmetadata.longdescription: Conducting and Visualizing Specification Curve Analyses // Provides utilities for conducting specification curve analyses (Simonsohn, Simmons Nelson (2015, doi: 10.2139/ssrn.2694998) or multiverse analyses (Steegen, Tuerlinckx, Gelman Vanpaemel, 2016, doi: 10.1177/1745691616658637) including functions to setup, run, evaluate, and plot all specifications.
